name: Poached Dried Apricots In White Wine
keywords: dessert, dried apricots, dry white wine, mascarpone, gluten-free, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mascarpone cheese at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer apricots in the wine and sugar with cardamom seeds until soft (about 20 minutes).
Pour apricots into a serving dish and let them sit at room temperature until ready to be eaten. Serve the apricots with mascarpone cheese and, if you like, sugar cookies.
